dmca.title: Google Group DMCA complaint - Joan Green Desgins
dmca.body:
Faxed to: (650) 963-3255 and emailed to: removals@google.com

October 24, 2006

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

Re: Second Report of MORE Copyright Infringements on Google Hosted Group, Dmommas-PC-Mess owned by Peggy James

Dear Sirs,

I am the designated copyright agent for Joan Green and her company, Joan Green Designs. This notice is to inform you that many more of Joan Green's copyrighted craft booklets appear in their entirety as illegally scanned images posted as downloadable, printable files on your hosted online group "Dmommas PC Mess" at:
http://groups. google. coralgrouu/Dmommas-PC-Mess
These illegal copies of Joan Green's patterns have all been posted by the Group Owner and sole poster to this group, Peggy James, email address, dmommaisharespc@gmail.com

This is a clear violation of International Copyright Law, US Copyright Law (specifically found in United States Code Title 17) as well as a violation of Google's own Terms of Service. This group is also in violation of trademarks rights, unfair business practices, and constitutes unfair competition and as such, I request this group be shut down.

The entire purpose of this group is to distribute illegal copies of copyrighted craft patterns. The group is using Google services for illegal purposes and will continue to do so, willfully, unless they are shut down. Each day that this group continues to illegally distribute copyrighted materials, Joan Green's company is losing money.

Joan Green is the exclusive owner of the copyrights to these following craft booklets and has not granted permission for anyone to post these publicly. On each of these postings, her company, Joan Green Designs, and her name, Joan Green, along with her copyright notice is clearly shown. The copyrighted works at issue are the posted scans of Joan Green's copyrighted booklets as follows:

1. Seasonal Tissue Box Posted at:
http://groups.google.com/group/Dmommas-PC-Mess/browse_frm/thread/7f93e3ccbf16314c/#
Message ID: 273ad4a70609110627y328c6418nadfbbe15d062d1a0(a,mail.gmail.com

19. Crayon Dots and Stripes Tissue Cover Posted at: http://groups.google.com/group/Dmommas-PC-Mess/browse_frm/thread/97a57f616c3cc395/#

20. Daisy Coasters in Frog Caddy Posted at: http://groups.google.com/group/Dmommas-PC-Mess/browse_frm/thread/e1631c1b856f8184/#
Message ID: 273ad4a70609160540h623ad146h74cef3cf73237fbd,mail.gmail.com


I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

Please immediately remove or disable all access to the infringing material.
 
This is our second notice of copyright violations of Joan Green's copyrighted materials illegally posted by Group Owner, Peggy James. Peggy James' previous Google group, DmommaSharesPC was shut down due to the huge amounts of copyright violations she was responsible for. She has created this new group to replace the one you shut down. The stated purpose of her group is to post and share copyrighted craft patterns. She is a repeat offender who is flagrantly violating your terms of service, therefore I respectfully request that you not only terminate her group, but her membership to all of your services, per your terms of service.

I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right(s) that is allegedly infringed.

Should you require any further information regarding this matter, please contact me at the address indicated below.

Sincerely,
 
Cherie Marie Leck
Designated Copyright Agent for Joan Green and Joan Green Designs
PO Box 26309
Charlotte NC 28221
copyrights@craftdesigns4you.com
